SERVERLESS_RUNTIME.description: Serverless Runtime, comprised of a mandatory FaaS and an optional DaaS

ID.description: A unique identifier for the Serverless Runtime

SERVICE_ID.description: An internal identifier for the Cloud Edge Manager

CPU.description: Logical cores allocated to the VM containing the Function Runtime

MEMORY.description: RAM in MB allocated to the VM containing the Function Runtime

DISK_SIZE.description: Size in MB of the disk allocated to the VM containing the Function Runtime

VM_ID.description: ID of the VM containing the Function Runtime

STATE.description: The state of the VM containing the Function Runtime

ENDPOINT.description: HTTP URL of the Function Runtime. Will be empty if the VM has no network

SCHEDULING.description: Scheduling policies and requirements handled by an AI Enabled Orchestrator external to the Cloud Edge manager

POLICY.description: Policy applied to scheduling. Eg: 'energy, latency' will optimise the placement according to those two criteria

REQUIREMENTS.description: Requirements of the placement. For instance, 'energy_renewal' will only consider hypervisors powered by renewable energy

DEVICE_INFO.description: Information about the engine Client Device environment

LATENCY_TO_PE.description: Latency from the client device to the Provisioning Engine endpoint in miliseconds

GEOGRAPHIC_LOCATION.description: Geographic location of the client device in WGS84. https://it.wikipedia.org/wiki/WGS84
